titles.title: Let Isreal be glad in her Maker

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let Israel be glad in her Maker.
Let the sons of Zion rejoice in their King.
Let us praise His Name with dancing!
Let us praise Him as we sing!
Let us praise His name with dancing!
Let us praise Him as we sing!
For the Lord has His joy in His people,
And we have our joy in our King.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Que los hijos de Sión regocijen
Que Israel se alegre en su Hacedor
Alabemos su nombre con la danza
Alabémosle cantando.
Alabemos su nombre con la danza
Alabémosle cantando
Porque Dios tiene gozo en su pueblo
y tenemos nuestro gozo en el Rey.
